mean_cn: n. 合格证书，文凭；证明，证明书
mean_en: an official document proving that you have completed a course of study or passed an exam; a qualification obtained after a course of study or an exam
sentence: I got my graduation certificate after finishing college.
sentence_trans: 在完成大学教育后，我获得了毕业证书。
word_etyma: certify证明 + cate表名词 → certificate证件
